verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Noah, <S%H5146><s%> Come <S%H935><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy house <S%H1004><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark; <S%H8392><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> thee have I seen <S%H7200><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me in this <S%H2088><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>

Of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> beast <S%H929><s%> thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> to thee by sevens, <S%H7651><s%> <S%H7651><s%> the male <S%H376><s%> and his female: <S%H802><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> by two, <S%H8147><s%> the male <S%H376><s%> and his female. <S%H802><s%>

Of fowls <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5775><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%> by sevens, <S%H7651><s%> <S%H7651><s%> the male <S%H2145><s%> and the female; <S%H5347><s%> to keep seed <S%H2233><s%> alive <S%H2421><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights; <S%H3915><s%> and <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> living substance <S%H3351><s%> that <S%H834><s%> I have made <S%H6213><s%> will I destroy <S%H4229><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> according unto all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him.

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> was six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when the flood <S%H3999><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him, into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood. <S%H3999><s%>

Of <S%H4480><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> beasts, <S%H929><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> that <S%H834><s%> are not <S%H369><s%> clean, <S%H2889><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> fowls, <S%H5775><s%> and of every thing <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H127><s%>

There went in <S%H935><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> the male <S%H2145><s%> and the female, <S%H5347><s%> as <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Noah. <S%H5146><s%>
And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> after seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the flood <S%H3999><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

In the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Noah's <S%H5146><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the same <S%H2320><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> were all <S%H3605><s%> the fountains <S%H4599><s%> of the great <S%H7227><s%> deep <S%H8415><s%> broken up, <S%H1234><s%> and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were opened. <S%H6605><s%>
And the rain <S%H1653><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> and forty <S%H705><s%> nights. <S%H3915><s%>

In the selfsame <S%H6106><s%> <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and Shem, <S%H8035><s%> and Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth, <S%H3315><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and Noah's <S%H5146><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> and the three <S%H7969><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with <S%H854><s%> them, into <S%H413><s%> the ark; <S%H8392><s%>

They, <S%H1992><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> after his kind, <S%H4327><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> bird <S%H6833><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> sort. <S%H3671><s%>

And they went in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Noah <S%H5146><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> is the breath <S%H7307><s%> of life. <S%H2416><s%>

And they that went in, <S%H935><s%> went in <S%H935><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> as <S%H834><s%> God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> him: and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shut him in. <S%H5462><s%> <S%H1157><s%>

And the flood <S%H3999><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> increased, <S%H7235><s%> and bore up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and it was lifted up <S%H7311><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed, <S%H1396><s%> and were increased <S%H7235><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and the ark <S%H8392><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the waters. <S%H4325><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> hills, <S%H2022><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>

Fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> upward <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> did the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevail; <S%H1396><s%> and the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered. <S%H3680><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> that moved <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> both of fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of cattle, <S%H929><s%> and of beast, <S%H2416><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H8318><s%> that creepeth <S%H8317><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> man: <S%H120><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> in whose nostrils <S%H639><s%> was the breath <S%H5397><s%> <S%H7307><s%> of life, <S%H2416><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the dry <S%H2724><s%> land, died. <S%H4191><s%>

And <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> living substance <S%H3351><s%> was destroyed <S%H4229><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground, <S%H127><s%> both man, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> cattle, <S%H929><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> the creeping things, <S%H7431><s%> and <S%H5704><s%> the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and they were destroyed <S%H4229><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> only <S%H389><s%> remained <S%H7604><s%> alive, and they that <S%H834><s%> were with <S%H854><s%> him in the ark. <S%H8392><s%>
And the waters <S%H4325><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> a hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
